roleset.name: all encompassing, without exception

example.name: absolute-j: arg1
example.text: The proletariat ideological belief is absolute ; Marxism is the basic principle , and is relative , from the global perspective , learning from advanced , absorbing civilizations , and constantly creating new values .

roleset.note: ABSOLUTE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. No FN class. (from absolute.01-j)
